settings.shortIntroduction: Located at Kampung Tiang Lama, Noponu Adventure Center provides hikers mountain-facing camping ground, with convenient facilities.
settings.shortIntroductionBm: Located at Kampung Tiang Lama, Noponu Adventure Center provides hikers mountain-facing camping ground, with convenient facilities.
settings.shortIntroductionCn: Located at Kampung Tiang Lama, Noponu Adventure Center provides hikers mountain-facing camping ground, with convenient facilities.
settings.landingPageNotice:
⚠️ Terms & Conditions
Note:
- Please book at least one day before actual day of hiking.
- Hiking activities is at your own risk.
- Kids below 12 years old are allowed to join hiking activities up to canyon entrance
Cancellation Policy
- All prepaid bookings are NON-refundable and NON-transferable
- No cancellation will be applied once booking is confirmed
- You must provide notice, at least 3 days before actual date for any amendment, and it will be subject to availability
- No show or Non-arrival will result in forfeiture of the payments.
settings.landingPageNoticeBm:
⚠️ Terma & Syarat
Nota:
- Sila buat tempahan sekurang-kurangnya sehari sebelum hari pendakian.
- Aktiviti mendaki adalah dijalankan atas risiko sendiri.
- Kanak-kanak di bawah 12 tahun dibenarkan menyertai aktiviti mendaki sehingga ke tempat masuk canyon.
Polisi Pembatalan
- Semua tempahan yang telah dibayar adalah tidak boleh dipulangkan wang dan tidak boleh dipindah-milik
- Tiada pembatalan akan dibenarkan setelah tempahan disahkan
- Anda perlu memberikan notis, sekurang-kurangnya 3 hari sebelum tarikh sebenar untuk sebarang pindaan, dan ia tertakluk kepada ketersediaan
- Kegagalan hadir tanpa sebarang notis akan mengakibatkan penghapusan bayaran.
settings.landingPageNoticeCn:
⚠️條款與條件
備註：
- 請在實際遠足日的至少一天前進行預訂。
- 遠足活動由您自行承擔風險。
- 12歲以下的兒童可以參加遠足活動，直到峽谷入口。
取消政策
- 所有預付的訂單不可退款，不可轉讓
- 一旦確認預訂，將不接受取消
- 您必須至少提前3天通知進行任何修改，並視情况而定
- 未出席或未到達將導致支付款項的喪失。
settings.promoTextCn: 我们每个星期日都关闭.

activityData.title: Taralamas 6km
activityData.itinerary:
0730 Registration and briefing,
0800 Start hiking,
0930 Arriving at Sungai Widu,
1000 Entering Taralamas River Canyon,
1100 Resting by the riverside,
1300 Returning to the starting point,
1500 Finish hiking

activityData.title: Taralamas 8km
activityData.itinerary:
0730 Registration and briefing,
0800 Start hiking,
0930 Arriving at Sungai Widu,
0930-1030 Exploring Sungai Widu,
1030 Entering Taralamas River Canyon,
1100 Exit Taralamas,
1100-1230 Resting by the riverside,
1230 Returning to the starting point,
1430 Finish hiking

activityData.title: Camping
activityData.shortItemDetails: Mountain facing camping ground with basic facilities.
activityData.shortItemDetailsBm: Mountain facing camping ground with basic facilities.
activityData.shortItemDetailsCn: Mountain facing camping ground with basic facilities.
activityData.details: ❌ Tent is not provided,✔️ Toilet,✔️ Kitchen,✔️ Water supply,✔️ View Gunung Kinabalu,✔️ Stargazing activities,✔️ Lampu Solar,Anda boleh menginap di Noponu Camp site sehari sebelum melawat Taralamas River Canyon. Di sini anda dapat menikmati pemandangan gunung Kinabalu, Sunrise seawal 5.30 pagi, awan karpet. Pada waktu malam jika bernasib baik,  anda boleh melihat keindahan bintang dan Milky Way.

information.Homestay:
You are welcomed to stay at Kampung Tiang Lama. You will be more energetic for the hike (starts early morning), while also supporting locals by staying in their homestay / campsite.

📍Mimpori Nature Homestay booking


📍MR Homestay booking


📍Noponu Camping Site

For homestay / campsite, please contact respective owner or their website directly for latest price/details.
information.Junction:
Junction from main road into Kg. Tiang Lama


Simpang masuk ke Kg Tiang Lama adalah 26km dari Tambunan dan 29km dari Ranau. Ada Signboard yang jelas sebelum sampai ke simpang.
Junction to Kg Tiang Lama is 26km from Tambunan roundabout and 29km from Ranau. There are clear signboard before and at the junction.
村庄的入口位于Tambunan(26公里处)和Ranau(29公里处)之间. 到达路口之前有明确的路标.
information.After Junction:
Selepas masuk dari jalan besar, anda akan melalui 25km jalan batu kecil sebelum sampai ke Kg Tiang Lama.
Turn in when you reach the junction to Jalan Widu and you will be on gravel road for another 25km.
从大路进来还需要再走25公里的石子路.

Jalan yang ditutupi dengan batu kecil adalah dalam keadaan yang baik. Semua jenis kereta boleh masuk kecuali jenis kereta yang rendah atau dimodifikasi-rendah. Jalan batu kecil itu mengambil masa kira-kira 45 minit.
The gravel road is well maintained and good for any normal car. Do not use lowered car, Just drive normally and you will reach Kg Tiang Lama in about 45 minutes.
石子路的状况良好,多数汽车都能顺利通过(过低的车辆不行).缓慢行驶的话,大约45分钟你就会到达村庄了.
information.Suitable Car:
Suitable
Bicycle, Motorcycle, Car (myvi, saga),
13 seaters van like Toyota Hiace, 4wd
请使用四轮驱动车

Less Suitable
Kancil, viva

Not Suitable
Honda city, Toyota Altis, bus, sports car, Lamborghini, Ferrari, Myvilution, and all modified lowered car
请不要驾您的跑车来
information.How To Book:
Step 1: Read all information
Step 2: Book here
(The link contains available slots, automatic price calculation, and bank info)

After booking, you will get an email with link to submit your payment proof.
Just follow instructions in the email.
information.Weather of Sabah:
Sabah has a tropical hot and humid weather (equatorial climate). Temperatures normally ranging from 20°C (68°F) to 32°C (90°F).
Weather in Kampung Tiang Lama is colder as it is surrounded by thick forests and also at a higher elevation.
